title: Asylum In The Mind: Doctor Wise Book 6
description: Demonic possession, decapitated corpses, and Doctor Leonard Wise might be the next victim.Eight years ago, psychic Leonard Wise saw a vision of a demon. He lost control and crashed his car, killing his fianc√©e and crippling his leg.The police share with him a map listing a series of abductions that have occurred over the last eight years by a serial killer that abducts, tortures, and murders unsuspecting woman.As clues add up, Len believes an ancient entity possesses the killer he seeks, who targeted Len since the night he gained his abilities..Will Len risk everything he holds dear to free himself from a demon that has haunted his nightmares and every waking hour for the last eight years or die in the attempt?If you like tortured heroes, supernatural events, and amazing twists, then you'll love this book in the Doctor Wise series.Read Asylum In The Mind and fall into bedlam today!
author: Arjay Lewis
